job.title: Data Scientist

currently not permitted for this rolebrbremWe are seeking a highly analytical and creative person to help us understand our customers and our business through data You will have the opportunity to dig into data to better understand how customers use our product You will work closely with teams across the company to build your findings into automated models and reports that improve both our provider and consumer experiencesbrbrWe are a small fastmoving team that supports highimpact company initiatives including customerfacing models and deepdive analyses that inform business strategy Were looking for someone who thrives in a fastpaced environment excels at tackling ambiguous problems with rational and structured thinking and is eager to learn and apply new techniques to solve whatever issues arise If you are excited about using your quantitative and data expertise to help support informed and assured results join us to have an immediate impact on a fastgrowing teambrbrstrongIn this role you willbrbrstrongul liExplore and analyze complex data sets and use statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build data products and analytical solutions that deliver actionable insights and answer key business questionsli liProactively identify opportunities where data science can be used to enhance and augment existing solutions to improve our product and impact different areas of the businessli liPartner with other teams to create tools reports or product features that allow learnings or recommendations from the data to empower both internal stakeholders and customers to make better datadriven recommendationsli liWork with various stakeholders within the company to refine and teach the use of tools you have built and present findings to a broad audience of technical and nontechnical coworkers from other data scientists to executivesli liAutomate streamline and document new and existing data processes and models to build robust reusable and scalable solutionsli
